Description:
Meet the star of the GitHub keynote: a hacked Furby! See how our VP of Developer Relations, Martin, used GitHub Copilot to make his son's old toy sing, talk, and dance. It's connected to Home Assistant, and yes... there was a whole choir.

#GithubCopilot #Furby #GitHubUniverse

Stay up-to-date on all things GitHub by connecting with us:

About GitHub It’s where over 100 million developers create, share, and ship the best code possible. It’s a place for anyone, from anywhere, to build anything—it’s where the world builds software. https://github.com
Author: GitHub
Title: How GitHub Copilot hacked a Furby
